metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15692 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Nim 1.2.4, the standard library browsers mishandles the URL argument to browsers.openDefaultBrowser. This argument can be a local file path that will be opened in the default explorer. An attacker can pass one argument to the underlying open command to execute arbitrary registered system commands.

criterions.comment: nim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
